## Description {#details}

Generic interface to target specific assembler backends.

## Public Member Functions

### allowAutoPadding() {#ae73d9d817542f0f48fb14e17c4a7d9f9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual bool llvm::MCAsmBackend::allowAutoPadding () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Return true if this target might automatically pad instructions and thus need to emit padding enable/disable directives around sensative code.

Returns the minimum size of a nop in bytes on this target.

## Target Fixup Interfaces

### applyFixup {#ae38b6e0fdf26adde1fa4ac04e12931f7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::MCAsmBackend::applyFixup (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> &amp; Target, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; char &gt; Data, uint64&#95;t Value, bool IsResolved, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}>
Apply the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code> for given <code>Fixup</code> into the provided data fragment, at the offset specified by the fixup and following the fixup kind as appropriate.

Errors (such as an out of range fixup value) should be reported via <code>Ctx</code>. The <code>STI</code> is present only for fragments of type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcrelaxablefragment">MCRelaxableFragment</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdatafragment">MCDataFragment</a> with hasInstructions() == true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcasmbackend-h/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcasmbackend-h">MCAsmBackend.h</a>.
